stories.Title: It's not science fiction is reality
stories.Description: Unlocking a new era of possibilities, Sanctuary AI presents Phoenix: a general-purpose robot equipped with an AI control system and human-like intelligence.
stories.Tweet: It's not science fiction is reality 📦 Unlocking a new era of possibilities, Sanctuary AI presents Phoenix: a general-purpose robot equipped with an AI control system and human-like intelligence. #robotics https://www.sanctuary.ai/

stories.Title: A robotic surprise at Tesla's 2023 shareholders meeting
stories.Description: The company's humanoid robot program is reaching new heights. Tesla Bot or Optimus dazzles in impressive prototype footage, demonstrating great progress in stability and mobility.
stories.Tweet: A robotic surprise at Tesla's 2023 shareholders meeting 📦 The company's humanoid robot program is reaching new heights. Tesla Bot or Optimus dazzles in impressive prototype footage, demonstrating great progress in stability and mobility. #tesla https://electrek.co/2023/05/16/tesla-bot-sideshow-new-footage-robots/

stories.Title: Stability AI is committed to open-source development
stories.Description: With the release of StableStudio, the official open-source variant of DreamStudio, the company plans for users to easily create and edit stunning images using generative AI.
stories.Tweet: Stability AI is committed to open-source development 📦 With the release of StableStudio, the official open-source variant of DreamStudio, the company plans for users to easily create and edit stunning images using generative AI. #ai https://www.theverge.com/2023/5/17/23726751/stability-ai-stablestudio-dreamstudio-stable-diffusion-artificial-intelligence

stories.Title: Amazon's Alexa keeps pace in the AI race
stories.Description: According to Rohit Prasad, the head scientist for Alexa, its impact has only grown over time, and its instant availability and voice communication set it apart from web-based AI models.
stories.Tweet: Amazon's Alexa keeps pace in the AI race 📦 According to Rohit Prasad, the head scientist for Alexa, its impact has only grown over time, and its instant availability and voice communication set it apart from web-based AI models. #amazon https://www.cnbc.com/2023/05/17/amazons-alexa-head-defends-companys-work-on-ai-amid-chatgpt-boom.html

stories.Title: AI is transforming Parkinson's research
stories.Description: A new tool can now predict the development of the disease up to 15 years in advance using blood samples. This revolutionary technology brings hope to Parkinson's patients.
stories.Tweet: AI is transforming Parkinson's research 📦 A new tool can now predict the development of the disease up to 15 years in advance using blood samples. This revolutionary technology brings hope to Parkinson's patients. #ai https://www.medicalnewstoday.com/articles/ai-tool-detects-parkinsons-up-to-15-years-early-with-96-accuracy

stories.Title: Tesla targets 2024 for Roadster production
stories.Description: Elon Musk announced at Tesla's shareholder meeting that the Roadster would be designed and engineered this year, with production to “hopefully” begin next year.
stories.Tweet: Tesla targets 2024 for Roadster production 📦 Elon Musk announced at Tesla's shareholder meeting that the Roadster would be designed and engineered this year, with production to “hopefully” begin next year. #tesla https://electrek.co/2023/05/16/tesla-roadster-production-delayed-again-to-2024-four-years-late/

stories.Title: Elon Musk is teasing new Tesla EVs
stories.Description: With a focus on industry-leading design and manufacturing, Tesla’s CEO revealed that they’re actively working on two new products.
stories.Tweet: Elon Musk is teasing new Tesla EVs 📦 With a focus on industry-leading design and manufacturing, Tesla’s CEO revealed that they’re actively working on two new products. #tesla https://techcrunch.com/2023/05/16/elon-musk-teases-two-new-evs-says-tesla-is-already-building-one/

stories.Title: Let's root for a successful liftoff
stories.Description: Axiom Space and SpaceX have limited launch opportunities this month for their Ax-2 mission to the International Space Station, with a launch date of May 21.
stories.Tweet: Let's root for a successful liftoff 📦 Axiom Space and SpaceX have limited launch opportunities this month for their Ax-2 mission to the International Space Station, with a launch date of May 21. #spacex https://spacenews.com/spacex-has-narrow-window-for-ax-2-launch/

stories.Title: Gear up for another TROPICS launch!
stories.Description: NASA and Rocket Lab are targeting May 22nd for the launch of the second pair of storm tracking CubeSats for the TROPICS mission.
stories.Tweet: Gear up for another TROPICS launch! 📦 NASA and Rocket Lab are targeting May 22nd for the launch of the second pair of storm tracking CubeSats for the TROPICS mission. #NASA https://www.nasa.gov/press-release/nasa-rocket-lab-announce-coverage-for-second-tropics-launch/

stories.Title: Eco-friendly air travel in sight
stories.Description: Cosmic Aerospace, a Denver startup, is pushing the boundaries of aviation innovation by developing a fully electric plane to combat air pollution from regional flights.
stories.Tweet: Eco-friendly air travel in sight 📦 Cosmic Aerospace, a Denver startup, is pushing the boundaries of aviation innovation by developing a fully electric plane to combat air pollution from regional flights. #startups https://www.cnbc.com/2023/05/16/cosmic-aerospace-is-working-on-an-electric-plane-with-real-range.html

stories.Title: Designing websites is easier with Dora AI
stories.Description: This powerful text-to-website AI tool generates, customizes, and deploys websites using natural language. Get ready to embrace limitless design possibilities!
stories.Tweet: Designing websites is easier with Dora AI 📦 This powerful text-to-website AI tool generates, customizes, and deploys websites using natural language. Get ready to embrace limitless design possibilities! #programming https://www.producthunt.com/posts/dora-ai-alpha

stories.Title: Don’t forget to log into your Google account
stories.Description: It has been announced recently that Google will begin deleting accounts that have remained inactive for two years, as part of its efforts to tighten security.
stories.Tweet: Don’t forget to log into your Google account 📦 It has been announced recently that Google will begin deleting accounts that have remained inactive for two years, as part of its efforts to tighten security. #google https://blog.google/technology/safety-security/updating-our-inactive-account-policies/
